Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 2 of Homepage edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 3 of the Help page edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
Action: Round 3 Of The Help Page Edits

Text: #G02# As a Website user, I want to access published FABS files, so that I can see the new files as they come in.
#G02# As an owner, I want to be sure that USAspending only send grant records to my system.
#G02# As a user, I want to access the raw agency published files from FABS via USAspending.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want to be able to include a large number of flexfields without performance impact.
Action: Include A Large Number Of Flexfields Without Performance Impact

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to track the issues that come up in Tech Thursday, so that I know what to test and what want s to be fixed.
Action: Track The Issues Thursday Come Up In Tech

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to begin user testing, so that I can validate stakeholder UI improvement requests.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to schedule user testing, so that I can give the testers advanced notice to ensure buy-in.
#G02# As a Developer, I want to prevent users from double publishing FABS submissions after refreshing, so that there are no duplicates.
Action: Prevent Users From Publishing Double After Refreshing

Text: #G02# As a Developer , I want to clarify to users what exactly is triggering the CFDA error code in each case.
#G02# As a broker team member, I want to make some updates to the SQL codes for clarity.
Action: Make To The Sql Codes For Clarity

Text: #G02# As a data user, I want to see the office names derived from office codes, so that I can have appropriate context for understanding them.
Action: See The Office Names From Office Codes

Text: #G02# As a broker team member, I want to ensure the Broker resources, validations, and P&P pages are updated appropriately for the launch of FABS and DAIMS v1.1.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to determine how agencies will generate and validate D Files from FABS and FPDS data.
#G02# As an agency user, I want to leave off the last 4 digits of the ZIP without an error, so that I can complete my submissions.
Action: Leave Off The Last Digits Of The Zip Without An Error

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to download the uploaded FABS file, so that I can get the uploaded file.
#G02# As a Developer I want to quickly access Broker application data, so that I can investigate issues.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to have read-only access to DABS, so that I can view DABS pages without wanting two sets of permissions.
#G03# As a Customer, I want to Create a Customer Portal User Account, so that I can log on to the Customer Portal and perform transactions that first require user authentication.
Action: Create A Portal, Customer User Account

Text: #G03# As an Applicant, I want to Pay Fee, so that I can satisfy outstanding charge associated with the service requested or received from the County.
#G03# As a Staff member, I want to Perform a Completeness Review, so that I can validate when an application is complete and eligible for further technical review.
#G03# As a Staff member, I want to Record an Internal Note, so that I can share information with other Staff collaborating on the record.
#G03# As a Planning Staff member, I want to Evaluate Consistency with the Comprehensive Plan, so that I can complete my required review of a plan set and/or application.
Action: Evaluate Consistency With The Comprehensive Plan

Text: #G03# As a Zoning Staff member, I want to Process the Requests for Zoning Information, so that I can capture my response to the request in the system and also send a communication from the system to the Applicant.
#G03# As a Staff member, I want to Manage Affidavits, so that I can ensure compliance with the requirements prior to the hearing.
#G03# As a Plan Review Staff member, I want to Assign Plans for Review, so that I can ensure plans have been assigned to the appropriate Plan Reviewer.

#G03# As a Plan Review Staff member, I want to Track the Completion of Required Plan Reviews, so that I can ensure all plan review tasks are completed, results have been sent to the Applicant and any downstream steps are initiated such has a final review or payment for permit issuance.
Action: Track The Completion Of Required Plan Reviews

Text: #G03# As an Applicant, I want to Complete Building Development Project, so that I can receive any posted bond and/or obtain occupancy.
#G03# As an Inspection Supervisor, I want to Manage Inspector Workload, so that I can meet service level and quality requirements.
#G04# As a user, I want to click on the address, so that it takes me to a new tab with Google Maps.
#G04# As a user, I want to add donation centers as favorites on my profile, so that I can view them later.
Action: Add Donation Centers As Favorites On Profile

Text: #G04# As a user, I want to be able to give my email ID, so that I can receive notifications for new events as they are posted.
#G04# As a user, I want to be able to view a map display of the public recycling bins around my area.
Action: View A Map Display Of The Public Recycling

Text: #G04# As a user, I want to be able to view the safe disposal events currently being organised around my area.
Action: View The Currently Safe Disposal Events Around Area

Text: #G04# As an admin, I want to be able to add or remove recycling facilities' information, so that users get the most recent information.
#G04# As a company, I want to have a website that is easy to use, so that I can upload or delete stuff step by step.
#G04# As a user, I want to link my email account to my profile, so that I can get a temporary password in case I forget my own one.
#G04# As a user, I want to contact the administrators, so that I can give feedback or ask for help.
#G04# As an admin, I want to view user error logs, so that I can fix or review any issues that are being faced by users of the system.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to edit the data source of data I have already imported, So that I can fix bugs or make enhancements in the API built for my data.
Action: Edit The Data Source Of Data

Text: #G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to import data in Excel, So that I do not have to convert data formats in order to use the data packager.
#G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to filter, sort and aggregate data by multiple dimensions and measures, So that I can get more granular views on the data.
Action: Aggregate Filter Data By Multiple Dimensions

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to have stepped zoom on map visualisations, So that I can have better control over the navigation experience inside a map view.
#G05# As a Developer, I want to be able to customise the Brand Name and Icon, and Primary Color of all frontend Javascript apps, So that I can customise the branding for my own needs.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to normalise measures by population, So that I work with datasets in reference to their contextual constraints.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to know if my CSV file is valid, So that I can fix possible data issues before publishing it on Open Spending.
#G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to search any dataset published and publicly accessible by their title and metadata, So that I can find the datasets I'm interested in.

#G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to visualize by default in treemap, bubble tree, map and pivot table the most recent year when my dataset contain multiple years, So that I'm not confused with the amounts.
Action: Recent, Year Visualize By Default In Treemap Dataset When Contain Multiple Years

Text: #G05# As an API user, I want to be able to change the colors of the embedded visualisations in my own platform, So that I can customize the visualisations.
Action: Change The Colors Of The Embedded Visualisations In Own Platform

Text: #G08# As a Developer, I want to get a Data Package into Node, so that I can start using the data for doing analysis and visualizations.
Action: Get A Data Package Into Node

Text: #G08# As a Researcher, I want to get a Data Package into Julia in seconds, so that I can start using the data for doing analysis and visualizations.
Action: Get A Data Package Into Julia In Seconds

Text: #G08# As a Researcher, I want to be able to save new visualizations, so that I can share them with others or include them in the Data Package.
#G08# As a ResearcherPublisher, I want to know that my data conforms to its Data Package profile, so that I can feel trust in the validity and usefulness of the data.
#G08# As a Developer, I want to get a Data Package into Python in seconds, so that I can start using the data for doing analysis and visualizations.
Action: Get A Data Package Into Python In Seconds

Text: #G08# As a Researcher, I want to get my Excel spreadsheet into a Data Package, so that I can benefit from better tooling and standardization.
Action: Get Excel Spreadsheet Into A Data Package

Text: #G08# As a Developer, I want to do exploratory data analysis in R and operationalize that analysis in Python, so that I can use the best tool for the job.
Action: Do Exploratory Data Analysis In R

Text: #G08# As a Developer, I want to get a Data Package into Julia in seconds, so that I can start using the data in doing analysis and visualizations.
Action: Get A Data Package Into Julia In Seconds

Text: #G08# As a Developer, I want to get a Data Package into C++ in seconds, so that I can start using the data in doing analysis and visualizations.
Action: Get A Data Package Into C++ In Seconds

Text: #G08# As a ResearcherGovernment Publisher, I want to add general country names to my dataset that only contains country codes, so that my dataset is more readable.
Action: Add General Country Names To Dataset Only Contains Country Codes

Text: #G08# As a government Publisher, I want to make it easy to prove that our published data is valid, so that I can claim that we are living up to our transparency commitments.
Action: Embed An Interactive Preview Of Data On Site

Text: #G08# As a publisher, I want to embed an interactive preview of my data on my site, so that users can be encouraged that this is the correct data for them.
#G08# As a publisher, I want to package reproducible steps to get a certain data state, so my methodology is transparent and can be rerun by others.
Action: Provided With A Tool Generate Basic Statistics About A Dataset

Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to mark my email address as private even if the rest of my profile is not, so that no one can contact me.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to access old news that is no longer on the home page, so that I can access things I remember from the past or that others mention to me.
Action: Access Old News Longer Is No On The Home Page

Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to subscribe to an RSS feed of news, so that I remain sufficiently and easily informed.
Action: Subscribe To An Rss Feed Of News

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming Certification Courses and can page through them if there are a lot, so that I can choose the best course for me.
Action: See A List Of All Upcoming Certification Courses

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming Events, so that I can decide if I want to attend any.
Action: See A List Of All Upcoming Events

Text: #G10# As a site administrator, I want to create an Other Course or Event that is not charged a listing fee, so that the Scrum Alliance doesn't charge itself for Scrum Gatherings that it puts on.
Action: Create An Other Course Not Charged A Listing Fee

Text: #G10# As a site admin, I want to delete any course or event, so that I can remove things that will no longer occur.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to turn a course into an event or an event into a course, so that I can correctly classify anything that was entered incorrectly.
Action: Turn A Course Into An Event

Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to download the latest training material and methodology PDFs, so that I have them.
Action: Methodology The Latest Training Material Pdfs

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to read a new article on the front page about once a week, so that I am up on all the latest happenings.
Action: Read A New Article On The Front Page A Week Once

Text: #G10# As the site editor, I want to have pretty good control over how the article, so that articles are visually appealing.
Action: Have Pretty Good Control Over How The Article

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to click the link from the article teaser to take me directly to the body of the article. not to another teaser setup, so that I can easily finish the article.
Action: Click The Link From The Article Teaser
The Link Take To The Body Of The Article

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to do a full-text search of article body, title, and author name, so that I can find what I want.
Action: Do A Full Search Of Title
Do A Full Search Of Author Name
Do A Full Text Search Of Article Body

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to subscribe to an RSS feed of articles, so that I can read them without visiting the site.
Action: Subscribe To An Rss Feed Of Articles

Text: #G10# As a site editor, I want to have a prominent area on the home page where I can put special announcements not necessarily news or articles, so that I can give them additional exposure.
Action: Have A Prominent Area On The Home Page Not

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to see new content when I come to the site, so that I come back more often.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to view a section of the website that teaches me the basics of what Scrum is, so that I can learn that quickly.
Action: View A Section Of The Website Teaches Me The Basics What Scrum Is

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to view lists on the site of all Certified Scrum Masters, Practitioners, Trainers, and Certified Scrum Product Owners.
Action: View Lists On The Site Of Certified Product Scrum Owner
View Lists On The Site Of Practitioner
View Lists On The Site Of Trainer
View Lists On The Site Of All Certified Scrum Masters

Text: #G10# As a CSM, I want to be charged a fee once I am approved for Practitioner status, so that my certification status can be activated.
#G11# As a developer, I want to have the subdomain beta.nsf.gov be set up, so that I can deploy a beta site to it.
#G11# As a team member, I want to have a prioritized list of features and elements of a future social element page, so that I can work with the engineers to determine feasibility.
Action: Have A Prioritized List Of Element
Have A Prioritized List Of Features Of A Social, Future Element Page

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to determine a design direction for the beta social page, so that we can implement a beta site quickly without established brand guidelines.
Action: Determine A Design Direction For The Social, Beta Page

Text: #G11# As a content editor, I want to be able to easily find content, so that I can edit it.
#G11# As a user, I want to add a video to my article.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to have an updated roadmap document, so that I can see prioritized areas to focus on for the next few months and beyond.
#G11# As a researcher, I want to develop the user research protocol for internal workflows, so that we can begin testing against a CMS prototype.
Action: Develop The User Research Protocol For Internal Workflows

Text: #G11# As an NSF employee, I want to have high-level strategy recommendations to implement in conjunction with the new CMS.
Action: Implement In Conjunction With The New Cms

Text: #G11# As a content designer, I want to demonstrate the value of user-centered content design to ensure it's an integral part of our recommendations.
Action: Demonstrate The Value Of User, Centered Content Design 'S An Integral Part Of Recommendations

Text: #G11# As a VisualDesigner, I want to create a moodboard to aid with visual design concepts for the nsf.gov website, so that we can discuss different design concepts with stakeholders.
Action: Aid With Visual Design Concepts For The Nsf.Gov Website

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to know what visual design related tasks we might need to plan for this sprint, so that I can assign tasks as necessary.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to see how the user recruitment form looks and behaves on a sample page, so that I can understand the impact the recruitment will have on the NSF page.
Action: Behaves The User Recruitment Form On A Sample Page

Text: #G11# As an NSF employee, I want to know where the initial in-person meeting will be, so that I can plan on attending.
#G11# As a team member, I want to know when meetings are, so that I can plan accordingly.
#G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to keep camper records from previous years, so that the amount of work I need to do is lowered.
Action: Keep Camper Records From Previous Years

Text: #G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to create, modify rules that campers and camp workers has to follow.
#G12# As a camp administrator, I want to store campers' emergency information in a database, so that I can easily notify the necessary parties in case of an emergency.
Action: Store Campers' Emergency Information In A Database

Text: #G12# As a camp administrator, I want to store camper's immediate parent/guardian's information, so that I can easily call to notify them in case a grossly unacceptable behavior.
#G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to delete tasks/activities I scheduled, so that I can keep the schedule clean of unneeded activities.
#G12# As a camp administrator, I want to be able to see only events for a specific group/groups on the event calendar, so that I can easily read the data on the calendar without too much clutter.
Action: See Only Events For A Specific Group On The Event Calendar

Text: #G12# As a parent, I want to be able to message my child's counselors, so that I can voice my concerns or check on my child's progress.
#G12# As a parent, I want to be able to share any photos the camp has taken of my child.
Action: Share Any Photos The Camp Has Taken Of Child

Text: #G12# As a camp worker, I'm able to report a camper to the manager with an inappropriate behavior.
Action: Report A Camper To The Manager With An Inappropriate Behavior

Text: #G12# As a camp worker, I'm able to report a list of supplies to the manager that the camp is short of.
Action: Report A List Of Supplies To The Manager The Camp Short

Text: #G13# As a moderator, I want to add an item to the list of items to be estimated, so that so that we can be flexible and accommodate situations where we think of a new story while playing.
Action: Add An Item To The List Of Items To Estimated

Text: #G13# As a moderator, I want to enter the agreed-upon estimate, so that we can move on to the next item when we agree.
#G13# As a moderator, I want to copy/paste stories from a spreadsheet, so that I can get started more quickly.
#G13# As a moderator, I want to export a transcript of a game as a CSV file, so that I can further process the stories and estimates.
Action: Export A Transcript Of A Game As A Csv File

Text: #G13# As a moderator, I want to delete my account, so that account information and games are no longer stored.
#G13# As a participant, I want to be able to change my estimate up until the last person selects a card and all are shown, so that I can change my mind based on information I hear.
#G13# As a developer, I want to have a list of definitions for commonly used terms, so that everyone working on the project can understand each other more easily.
Action: Have A List Of Definitions For Commonly Used Terms

Text: #G13# As a user, I want to be able to use Unicode, so that I can use any language I like.
#G13# As a user, I want to see sensible and predictable URLs, so that the application feels logical and transparent.
#G13# As a Mike, I want to be able to see some metrics on use of the game, so that I can see how much it is being used.
Action: See Some Metrics On Use Of The Game

Text: #G14# As a Publisher, I want to permanently delete a data package, so that that it no longer takes up storage space.
#G14# As a Publisher, I want to validate the data I am about to publish to the registry, so that that I publish good data and know that I am doing.
#G14# As a Publisher, I want to publish a data package in the UI, so that that it is available and published.
Action: Publish A Data Package In The Ui

Text: #G14# As a Publisher, I want to create a data package in the UI so that it is available and published.
Action: Create A Data Package In The Ui

Text: #G14# As a consumer, I want to view the data package, so that that I can get a sense of whether I want this dataset or not.
#G14# As a Publisher, I want to preview a datapackage I have prepared, so that that I can check it works and share the results.
#G14# As a Consumer, I want to see some example data packages quickly, so that I get a sense of what is on this site and if it is useful to look further.
#G14# As a Consumer, I want to search based on description of data package, so that that I can find package which related to some key words.
Action: Search On Description Of Data Package

Text: #G14# As a Consumer, I want to download the data package in one file, so that that I don't have to download descriptor and each resource by hand.
Action: Download The Data Package In File

Text: #G14# As a Web Developer, I want to be able to install multiple versions of the same datapackage separately, so that that all my projects could be developed independently and deployed locally.
Action: Install Multiple Versions Of The Same Datapackage

Text: #G14# As a Consumer, I want to get a sense of the age of the datapackage that I have downloaded before, so that that I can decide if I should update or not.
Action: Get A Sense Of The Age Of The Datapackage

Text: #G14# As a Consumer, I want to view a Datapackage at a particular version online, so that that I can present/discuss the particular data timeslice of interest with other people.
Action: View A Datapackage At A Online Particular Version

Text: #G14# As a Publisher, I want to have private data packages, so that I can share just with my team.
#G16# As a visitor, I want to see the embargo status and release date clearly displayed and perhaps highlighted in some way.
#G16# As a collection curator, I want to see the referers for visitors who use resolver-abstracted links to reach my items.
Action: Refer To The Plan In Data Management Plan
Refer To The Disaster Recovery Plan In Grant Proposals

Text: #G16# As a collection curator, I want to restrict access to my collection or items to Duke IP addresses.
Action: Modify Existing Items In That Collection

Text: #G17# As an app developer, I want to explore a dataset instance of a type that was deployed as part of an app.
Action: Explore A Dataset Instance Of A Type Deployed As Part Of An App

Text: #G17# As an app developer, I want to ensure that when I deploy a new version of an app that includes an older version of a dataset type deployed by another app and I expect that the dataset instances created by this app use the dataset type code included in this app.
Action: Deploy A New Version Of An App Includes An Older Version Of A Dataset Type Another App

Text: #G17# As an app developer, I want to ensure that when I deploy a new version of an app that includes a different version of a dataset type deployed by another app and this app shares a dataset instance of this type with the other app the deployment will fail with a version conflict error.
Action: Deploy A New Version Of An App Includes A Different Version Of A Dataset Type Another App Shares A Dataset Instance Of This Type With The Other App The Deployment Fail With A Version Conflict Error
Deploy A New Version Of An App Includes A Different Version Of A Type This App Shares

Text: #G17# As a dataset developer, I want to have an archetype that helps me package my dataset type properly.
Action: Have An Archetype Helps Properly Package Dataset Type

Text: #G17# As an app developer, I want to only depend on the interface of a dataset type in my app and have the system inject the implementation at runtime.
Action: Depend On The Interface Of A Dataset Type In App

Text: #G17# As a hydrator user, I want to ensure that all dataset instances created by apps are available as sinks and sources for pipelines.
Action: Ensure All Dataset Instances Apps Available As Sinks For Pipelines
Ensure All Instances Apps Available As Source

Text: #G17# As a plugin developer, I want to include the code for a dataset type in the plugin artifact, so that when a pipeline using this plugin is created a dataset instance of that type is created and it is explorable and available to apps.
Action: Include The Code For A Dataset Type In The Plugin Artifact

Text: #G17# As a user, I want to specify schema as a SQL schema string.
Action: Specify Schema As A Sql Schema String

Text: #G17# As a user, I want to configure time-to-live in a uniform way across all dataset types.
Action: Configure Time In A Uniform Way Across All Dataset Types

Text: #G17# As a user, I want to update the properties of a dataset instance and I expect this to fail if the new properties are not compatible with a meaningful error message.
Action: Update The Properties Of A Dataset Instance

Text: #G17# As a user, I want to remove a single property of a dataset instance without knowing all other properties.
Action: Remove A Single Property Of A Dataset Instance Knowing All Other Properties

Text: #G17# As an app developer, I want to ensure that application redeployment fails if any of its datasets cannot be reconfigured.
#G18# As an investigator, I want to view the acceptance test results, so that I can understand how feature-complete the Neurohub node currently is.
#G18# As a researcher, I want to upload files prior to having them attached to a log book page using a mapped network drive.

#G18# As a release engineer, I want to configure nightly builds that automatically perform a Neurohub installation on a virgin operating system, execute tests and report back results, without requiring any manual input/interaction.
Action: Configure Nightly Builds Automatically Perform A Neurohub Installation On A Virgin Operating System
Configure Nightly Builds Automatically Perform A Installation On A Virgin System Requiring Interaction
Configure Nightly Builds Automatically Perform A Neurohub Installation On A Virgin Operating System Requiring Any Manual Input

Text: #G18# As a user, I want to revert to an older version of an uploaded file.
Action: Revert To An Older Version Of An Uploaded File

Text: #G18# As a user, I want to have a visual way of viewing particular files uploaded over a time period.
Action: Have A Visual Way Viewing Particular Files Over A Time Period

Text: #G18# As a user, I want to associate together files involved in a experiment.
#G18# As a user, I want to modify or branch an experimental protocol, whilst retaining the original.
#G18# As a user, I want to draw tables using HTML tags as part of the content of a log book page.
#G18# As a system administrator, I want to migrate data from an older version of NeuroHub to the current version.
Action: Forward Important News Items To An External Mailing List

Text: #G18# As a user, I want to have a spreadsheet hosted within the Neurohub Web page, so that I can edit and calculate costs collaboratively with others while working on the proposal.
Action: Forms Provide With Feedback About The Course That Attended

Text: #G18# As a user, I want to either keep a logbook entry private or share it with individuals rather than groups.
Action: Recorded In A Neurohub Log Book Executing A Workflow

Text: #G18# As a researcher, I want to have the ability to insert Greek symbols into my logbook entries.
#G18# As a researcher, I want to have electronic support for keeping track of which data sets were used/output/modified as part of a particular experiment.
Action: Provided With A Mechanism Electronically Sharing Papers
Provided With A Mechanism Note With Other Researchers

Text: #G18# As a researcher, I want to have a timeline display of multiple data files and their associated images, so that I can compare the data taken from experiments on particular dates.
Action: Have Remote Access To Data For Site Off Working

Text: #G18# As a researcher, I want to have the system to provide standard metadata, that all researchers in the centre (and beyond) can use, so that we can better understand each others' data.
#G18# As a researcher, I want to have physiology images to be annotated with standard meta data, so that my data can later be searched for and understood.
Action: Attach Standard Meta Data For Behavioural Observations

Text: #G18# As a researcher, I want to have at least some meta data to be automatically inserted when new data is added to the system.
Action: Attach Detailed Meta Data To The Data

Text: #G18# As a researcher, I want to have the ability to form links between objects, for example File A is an analysis of File B, so that data can be searched by type and by association.

#G18# As a researcher, I want to have any data that I have written to the VRE to be protected from modification or deletion, so that original data can always be traced back to an experiment and a point in time.

#G18# As a researcher, I want to associate meta data to the group as a whole at some point in time after the bulk upload has completed, so that I have a period of time to reflect on suitable values for the meta data.
Action: Change The Sharing Of Multiple Files

Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED on a bracelet or a necklace, so that I can always wear him with me.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to zoom into visual content.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have video conversation with others.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive support to use the public transport.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for navigation.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to control the TV and radio.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to use video calls in case of emergency.
Action: Use Video Calls In Case Of Emergency

Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED contact the nearest caregiver when I ask ALFRED for urgent help.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see whether I already have taken my pills, so that I can avoid an overdose.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to be able to see if the patient has taken her medicine.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to maintain my contact list in my phone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to insert my meetings into ALFRED using speech.
Action: Insert Meetings Into Alfred Using Speech

Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a reminder from ALFRED on all the things I need to bring with me when I leave the house.
Action: Receive A Reminder From Alfred On The Things

Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to help me navigate despite my mild cognitive impairments.
Action: Alfred Help Despite Cognitive, Mild Impairments

Text: #G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's breathing frequency.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have feedback on the activity level of the user.
Action: Have Feedback On The Activity Level Of The User

Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to do guided exercises with ALFRED and ALFRED should also use sensors to capture health data while I am doing exercises.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive suggestions about local sport Classes.
Action: Receive Suggestions About Local Sport Classes

Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to remind me to keep a good body posture.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to remind people to exercise regularly.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to games that require the combination of mental and physical exercise, such as opposing motion exercises of the arms and legs.
Action: Games Require The Combination Of Physical
Games Require The Such Combination Of Mental Exercise Opposing Motion Exercises Of The Arms
Games Require The Such Combination Of Mental Exercise Opposing Exercises Of Leg

Text: #G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have a regular summary on how much exercise is performed by the user.
Action: Have A Regular Summary How Much Exercise Performed The User

Text: #G19# As an InformalCaregiver, I want to have a game that the carer could play together with the user, so that it would enable to monitor the users state of health but also have some fun time.
Action: Have A Game That The Carer Together Play With The User

Text: #G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to propose training that promotes complex thinking.
#G19# As a developer, I want to present my app to as many people as Possible.
Action: Present App To As Possible, Many People

Text: #G19# As a developer, I want to have detailed information of what happened when my App crashes on the users device.
#G19# As a developer, I want to present my App in several ways.
#G21# As a trainee, I want to limit to one registration per day per authenticated user, so that we don't have duplicate spaces.
Action: Limit To Registration Per Day Per Authenticated User

Text: #G21# As a trainingcoordinator, I want to have an admin view where all trainee information is shown and can be filtered to show a single training session, so that I can see WTF is happening.
Action: Have An Admin View All Trainee Information Shown

Text: #G21# As a anonymoususer, I want to have a link on the home page to a list of training options, so that I can take training.
Action: Have A Link On The Home Page To A List Of Training Options

Text: #G21# As a authenticateduser, I want to identify myself as and pay for a $350 company sponsorship, so that I can easily become a sponsor at this level without having to interface with badcamp personnel to get a sponsorship.
#G21# As a anonymoususer, I want to see a list of the sessions associated with sponsor attendees, so that I know where I can engage with this sponsor and where they are thought leaders.
Action: See A List Of The Sessions With Sponsor Attendees

Text: #G21# As a anonymoususer, I want to sign up for the BADCamp newsletter, so that I can stay up to date with the latest communications about BADCamp.
Action: Sign Up For The Badcamp Newsletter

Text: #G21# As a summit coordinator, I want to see a list of attendees signed up for my summit, so that I can communicate with my attendees by email prior to the event.
Action: See A List Of Attendees Up For Summit

Text: #G21# As a anonymoususer, I want to see specific details on summits, so that I can learn more about the summit I'm interested in to see if it matches my interests, register for the event, and get day-of knowledge to help me get to the location.
#G21# As a anonymoususer, I want to learn about posting jobs as a sponsor and contact the sponsorship person, so that I have the opportunty to post my job listing on the BADCamp site.
Action: Learn Posting Jobs As A Sponsor

Text: #G21# As a sponsor, I want to post a job, so that I can hire top-tier Drupal talent.
#G21# As a authenticateduser, I want to view the job board, so that I can look for an interesting Drupal gig!.
#G21# As a administrator, I want to bulk approve sessions as accepted, so that I can save time.
#G21# As a anonymoususer, I want to receive a notification when sessions have been evaluated, so that I know whether I've been accepted or rejected.
#G22# As a PI, I want to properly record all metadata, so that I can ensure proper running of the project in case of staff changes.
#G22# As a PI, I want to plan what kind of data I want to record/store, so that I can ensure it will possible to store it.
#G22# As a PI, I want to record information about my DMP, so that an Ethics Committee can review this for compliance with ethical standards.
#G22# As a data manager, I want to know which kind of data types will be produced or collected, so that I can determine what basic support services and functionalities are required.
#G22# As an IT staff member, I want to know which kind of data types will be produced or collected, so that I can determine what basic support services and functionalities are required.
#G22# As a research head, I want to access to the persistent identifiers of datasets provided in the DMP, so that I can check that the DMP has been implemented.
Action: Access To The Persistent Identifiers Of Datasets In The Dmp

Text: #G22# As a metadata manager, I want to have a short description of project, so that I can be informed about the metadata description.
Action: Have A Short Description Of Project

Text: #G22# As a data manager, I want to know the time plan for collecting data, so that I can plan the data management.
Action: Know The Time Plan Collecting Data

Text: #G22# As an archivemanager, I want to reuse the information regarding file format, so that I can apply automated checks for the file validation.
Action: Reuse The Information Regarding File Format

Text: #G22# As a researcher, I want to extract the description of the data collected, so that I can reuse it for the writing of a data paper.
Action: Extract The Description Of The Data

Text: #G22# As a researcher, I want to link research publications in the institutional repository or CRIS with DMP records, so that I can generate reports of research output resulting from a project.
Action: Link Research Publications In The Institutional Repository With Dmp Records

Text: #G22# As a repository operator, I want to know about the kind of data, so that I can evaluate the storage size and system.
Action: Know About The Kind Of Data

Text: #G22# As an IT staff member, I want to know with which software or technology the data is produced or used, so that I can determine what kind of technical services and functionalities are required.
#G22# As a data manager, I want to know whether the data can be reproduced efficiently, so that I can determine whether and how the data has to be stored.
#G22# As a data manager, I want to know the security requirements of the data, so that I can check whether the data can be kept secure.
Action: Know The Security Requirements Of The Data

Text: #G22# As a researcher, I want to record my intention to share data I have collected under terms of a particular licence, so that other researchers who use the data understand the rights of use.
Action: Collected Under Terms Of A Particular Licence

Text: #G23# As an Application Administrator, I want to assign Users to an Advanced Data Entry and ensure that the appropriate permissions are enforced.
Action: Assign Users To An Advanced Data Entry

Text: #G23# As a user, I want to add additional properties for repositories.
#G23# As an Archivist, I want to add Notes to other record types.
Action: Add Notes To Other Record Types

Text: #G23# As an Archivist, I want to assign a Level of description to a Resource or Resource Component and optionally specify another value if the Level is not in a predefined list.
Action: Assign A Level Of Description To Resource Component
Assign A Level Of Description To A Resource

Text: #G23# As an Archivist, I want to import EAD files that were exported by the Archivists' Toolkit.
Action: Import Ead Files Exported The Archivists' Toolkit

Text: #G23# As an Archivist, I want to create and edit Event records.
#G23# As an Archivist, I want to upload an EAD for import from within the frontend application.
Action: Upload An Ead For Import Within The Frontend Application

Text: #G23# As a Developer , I want to develop a custom importer.
#G23# As a Repository Manager , I want to create, update and delete any records in my repository.
#G23# As an Archivist, I want to create and edit Agent records.
#G23# As an Archivist, I want to associate a Subject record with a Resource description.
Action: Associate A Subject Record With A Resource Description

Text: #G24# As a depositor, I want to deposit and maintain datasets through Pure, so that I have a single onestop shop for managing my research outputs.
#G24# As a depositor, I want to deposit and maintain datasets through Virtual Research Environments and other workflow tools, so that I can continue to work with tools with which I'm familiar.
Action: Deposit Datasets Through Workflow, Other Tool
Deposit Datasets Through Virtual Research Environments
Maintain Datasets Through Virtual Research Environments
Maintain Datasets Through Workflow, Other Tool

Text: #G24# As a depositor, I want to deposit the files that I have, so that I don't have to spend a lot of time finding the right version and converting to the right format.
#G24# As a depositor, I want to place data under an embargo, so that my right of first use is protected, and I can fulfil my confidentiality responsibilities.
#G24# As a depositor, I want to allow my collaborators privileged access to datasets, so that we continue to have a productive relationship.
#G24# As a depositor, I want to attach subject specific discoverability metadata to records, so that researchers in my discipline can find my data more easily.
#G24# As a depositor, I want to link datasets with the project DMP, so that compliance with DMP can be demonstrated and whole project workflow is linked together.
Action: Link Datasets With The Project Dmp

Text: #G24# As a depositor, I want to manage multiple versions of the same dataset, so that changes to the dataset are transparent and do not compromise research integrity.
Action: Manage Multiple Versions Of The Same Dataset

Text: #G24# As a data reuser, I want to access the system in my native language, so that I am not put off reusing University of Bath data by language barriers.
Action: Access The System In Native Language

Text: #G24# As a Research Information manager, I want to have datasets linked to metadata about projects, so that I can report on projects depositing datasets in relation to funder requirements.
Action: Have Datasets To Metadata About Projects

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to know all the collections and objects in the DAMS for which I have custodial responsibility.
Action: Know The Collections In The Dams

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to say one collection is related to another collection.
#G25# As a repository manager, I want to describe a collection, including its title, it's inclusive / bulk dates, its language(s), and many other aspects.
Action: Describe A Collection Including Inclusive Date

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to indicate other descriptions of the collection that are outside the DAMS and of probable importance to users.
Action: Indicate Other Descriptions Of The Collection Are Of Probable Importance To Users
Indicate Other Descriptions Of The Collection Are Outside The Dams

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to indicate subjects that are related to an object.
Action: Indicate Subjects Related To An Object

Text: #G25# As a user, I want to know about other versions of the object or its metadata that might be of use to me.
Action: Know About Other Versions Of The Object Be Of Use To
Know About Other Versions Of Metadata

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to list all the components, in their appropriate order, for an object.
Action: List The Components In Appropriate Order For An Object

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to describe each component as necessary, including title, date(s), language(s), and other facets.
Action: Necessary Describe Each Component Including Title

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to know all events occurring to a component over its life cycle.
Action: Know All Events To A Component Over Life Cycle

Text: #G25# As a user, I want to be able to see and navigate the component hierarchy of an object.
Action: See The Component Hierarchy Of An Object
Navigate The Component Hierarchy Of An Object

Text: #G25# As a DAMS manager, I want to indicate to preservation managers the checksum and checksum method for each master file for a given object.
Action: Indicate To Preservation Managers The Checksum Method For Each Master File For A Given Object

Text: #G25# As a repository manager, I want to provide a title, in all useful forms, for my repository's collections, objects, and object components.
Action: Provide A Title In All Useful Forms For Object
Provide A Title In All Useful Forms For Repository's Collections
Provide A Title In All Useful Forms For Object Component

Text: #G25# As a DAMS manager, I want to present collections, objects, and object components by title.
#G25# As a user, I want to scope my searches for collections, objects, or object components to a specific language.
Action: Object Components To A Specific Language

Text: #G25# As a user, I want to see the geographical context of a collection, object, or object component, where pertinent.
Action: See The Geographical Context Of Object
See The Geographical Context Of Object Component
See The Geographical Context Of A Collection

Text: #G25# As a DAMS manager, I want to know all the statutes pertinent to an object or object component.
Action: Know The Pertinent Statutes To An Object
Know The Pertinent Statutes To Object Component

Text: #G25# As a DAMS manager, I want to know when the application of a statute to an object or object component has been modified, either manually or automatically.
#G25# As a DAMS manager, I want to know if an object or object component is subject to a library policy that restricts access in any way.
Action: Know An Object Subject To A Library Policy Restricts Access In Any Way

Text: #G25# As a DAMS manager, I want to know if application of a library policy to an object or object component has been modified, either manually or automatically.
#G25# As a DAMS manager, I want to track all events scheduled for recording in the DAMS.
Action: Track All Events For Recording In The Dams

Text: #G26# As an archivist, I want to set a date on which restrictions will be removed from a file, so that that I don't have to update this by hand.
Action: Set A Date On Which Restrictions Removed From A File

Text: #G26# As an archivist, I want to automatically generate technical metadata, so that I know the file size.
#G26# As an archivist, I want to link electronic versions of researchers' publications to citations, so that I can share them with other researchers.
Action: Link Electronic Versions Of Researchers' Publications To Citations

Text: #G26# As an archivist, I want to automatically assign unique identifiers to material I scan, so that I avoid potential errors.
#G26# As a donor representative, I want to supply incremental accruals to new and existing collections, so that material can be transferred on an ongoing basis.
Action: Supply Incremental Accruals To New Collections

Text: #G26# As an archivist, I want to manage loan documentation, including preservation photos, forms and correspondence, so that I can find it easily later.
Action: Manage Loan Documentation Including Preservation Photos

Text: #G26# As a researcher, I want to generate structured citation data, so that so I can cite a file in a publication.
#G26# As a researcher, I want to share a link to a file on social media, so that so I can show other people an interesting thing I found.
Action: Share A Link To A File On Social Media

Text: #G26# As a researcher, I want to locate photographs and documents that I can share on social media.
#G26# As an archivist, I want to see what a particular user has downloaded, so that I can track use of assets.
#G26# As an archivist, I want to make as much archival material as possible available for use, so that I can fulfill the RAC's mission.
Action: Possible Make As Much Archival Material

Text: #G26# As a researcher, I want to see common material across collections, so that so I can prepare a comprehensive analysis.
#G26# As an archivist, I want to search all files by keyword.
#G26# As an archivist, I want to upload inventories, so that our donor representatives have an easier time requesting their material.
#G26# As a researcher, I want to know the date on which something was digitized, so that I know if it's been digitized since I last looked.
Action: Know The Date On Which Something Digitized

Text: #G26# As an archivist, I want to search index cards and other non-public finding aids, so that I can provide better research assistance.
#G26# As an archivist, I want to access metadata and visual representations of index cards, so that I can use that information to assist researchers.
#G26# As an administrator, I want to assign rights to user groups or roles, so that I can control what users can and can't do.
#G26# As an administrator, I want to have researchers reset their own passwords, so that I don't have to send passwords in cleartext.
#G26# As an administrator, I want to limit who can see certain metadata fields, so that I can show or hide things from display based on user groups.
#G27# As a Cornell faculty member, I want to upload data to the repository and associate it with a publication, so that I receive attribution for my data as well as my publications.
Action: Associate The Repository With A Publication

Text: #G27# As a DB/IR administrator, I want to manage report/dataset name changes so patrons are able to find historic reports that have a different name from current report.
#G27# As a Cornell faculty member, I want to login remotely to the repository using Shibboleth, so that I can get remote access to Cornell campus-only content.
Action: Login To The Using, Repository Shibboleth

Text: #G27# As a library staff member, I want to be able to tell the researchers I'm helping with DMPs that Cornell has a repository system I can use for archiving and sharing results of their research, so that I can easily meet the needs of funder DMP requirements.

#G27# As a Cornell faculty member, I want to create a collection for my documents, or my organization's documents, and apply some distinctive branding to that collection, so that I can promote my work, or that of my organization.
Action: Create A Collection For Organization's Document
Apply Some Distinctive Branding To That Collection

Text: #G27# As a Cornell faculty member, I want to easily find all the items in the repository that I have authored, by searching on my name (author name authority and/or identification issue), because I keeps my publications in the repository up-to-date and points people tithe repository.
Action: Find The Items In The Repository Searching On Name Identification
Find The Items In The Repository Searching On Name Or
Find The Items In The Repository Searching On Name Issue
Find The Items In The Repository Searching On Name Author Name Authority
Find The Items In The Repository Searching On Name

Text: #G27# As a researcher, I want to discover items in the repository through the library's discovery system and Google, so that I can facilitate my easy use of the content.
Action: Discover Items In The Repository Through The Library's Discovery System
Discover Items In The Repository Through Google

Text: #G27# As a researcher, I want to receive updates when new works are published in a given collection or by a given author, so that I can discover more of their work.
#G27# As a DB/IR administrator, I want to manage customizable relationship groups in support of patron see also option.
Action: Manage Customizable Relationship Groups In Support Of Patron Option

Text: #G27# As a library staff member, I want to make digital items held in trusted external system searchable within our system, so that I can provide seamless access to disparate collections.
Action: Make Digital Items In Searchable, External, Trusted System Within System

Text: #G27# As a student, I want to learn who at Cornell has or is engaged in research related to a particular topic, so that I can find an appropriate advisor, choose which courses to enroll in, and identify work/internship opportunities.
#G27# As a library staff member, I want to upload material to the repository on the author's behalf, so that I can fulfill a service obligation.
Action: Upload Material To The Repository On The Author's Behalf

Text: #G27# As a DB/IR administrator, I want to upload new version of report/dataset while retaining previous versions for patron use.
Action: Upload New Version Of Report Retaining Previous Versions For Patron Use

Text: #G27# As a Cornell faculty member, I want to associate a researcherID or ORCID with a submission, so that there is no ambiguity between my work and someone else with the same name.
Action: Associate A Researcherid With A Submission

Text: #G27# As a library staff member, I want to have customizable metadata fields, so that each project is described in the most accurate way possible.

#G27# As an Extension Educator, I want to have a place to store a variety of documents, presentations and data sets I've created, that doesn't require an extra step in making available on my own County/Region/Project site (i.e. a list or directory of materials there is automatically updated when placed in a central archive/repository).
Action: Store A Variety Of Data Set

Text: #G27# As a DB/IR administrator, I want to have a personal account with the ability to change passwords to make them more secure or to retrieve forgotten ones.
#G27# As a repository support team member, I want to move a collection, so that I can fulfill the collection owner's request.

#G27# As an asset manager, I want to be assured that the redundant copies are continuously monitored for unwanted changes, and that if/when changes do occur, there is a mechanism by which I can determine the original object and restore it to all copies.
Action: By Which Restore The Original Object To All Copies

Text: #G27# As an asset manager, I want to be assured that there is a formal plan for the disposition of assets if the IR should cease.
#G27# As an asset manager, I want to have mechanism to pass ownership/management of the assets to a successor.
Action: Pass Ownership Of The Assets To A Successor

Text: #G27# As a patron, I want to email system provider to report issues and ask questions.
#G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music based on other users similar to myself.
Action: Search Music On Similar, Other Users To
Discover Music On Similar, Other Users To

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to receive content recommendations from similar profiles.
Action: Receive Content Recommendations From Similar Profiles

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to take a picture or upload an image, so that I am recommended with videos related to that picture or image.
#G28# As an admin, I want to filter and rank videos based on A/V quality aspects.
Action: Filter Videos On A Quality Aspects
Rank Videos On A Quality Aspects

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to automatically detect Snapshot Serengeti images with no classifiable animals in them.
Action: Detect Snapshot Serengeti Images With No Classifiable Animals In

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to detect important features such as areas of flooding, damage, temporary shelters, blocked roads etc in the satellite images.
Action: Detect Important Features Such As Areas Of Flooding
Detect Important Features Such As Areas Of Damage
Detect Important Features Such As Areas Of Temporary Shelter

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform prefiltering of the images to remove artefacts such as bright stars and camera read errors.
Action: Remove Artefacts Such As Bright Stars

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to identify the number of whales heard in a single audio file.
Action: Identify The Number Of Whales In A Audio, Single File

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when I should interrupt a volunteer.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know which piece of education I should give to a volunteer.
Action: Which Piece Of Education Give To A Volunteer

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when Zoonibot should give an explanation.
#G28# As an admin, I want to see a summary of articles, so that I reuse them.
